content: Hi,I want to know how to change email template language setting?I set default language at my zulip settings,but the zulip still send English email to user.I also try to change setting.py language_code,it done't work.
@ReturnYang this is something that's fixed in master since the 1.9.1 release. You can get the correct behavior by upgrading to a development version of Zulip using upgrade-zulip-from-git.
@Tim Abbott Thanks a lot,I'll try.
@Tim Abbott I found the docker isn't upgrading to 1.9.1 ,Should I build by myself? https://hub.docker.com/r/zulip/docker-zulip/tags
Yeah, we didn't bother doing a 1.9.1 release for docker because the changes there were only in the installer.
But for this you need a 1.10 release candidate, aka master.
